alert.note: Alert for Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:06AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lucie, southeastern Okeechobee and Martin Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 506 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indiantown, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Indiantown, Four Seasons Estates, Tradition and Saint Lucie West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
